page.title: 16CRICKET & FOOTBALL CLUBS
page.content:
Tacolneston Football Club consists of 2 teams,the Saturday team competing in {the Norwich & South Norfolk District {League,}the Sunday team competing in {the South Norfolk Sunday League}and being sponsored by South Norfolk Caterers. The pavilion is shared jointly with the Cricket club & members of both are fundraising to improve facilities.
The Cricket club is a member of the {Norfolk Cricket Association}& plays in {League Division 6.}Approx. 25 playing members are drawn from the local area & play each weekend during the season & practice at pre_season nets at Long Stratton Sports Centre. The aims of the club include promotion in the League & improvement of playing conditions & equipment.
